entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
